B

BOOK - Static variable in class suncertify.client.BookingDialog
The name of the Book button.
BOOK - Static variable in class suncertify.client.ClientFrame
The name of the edit booking button.
book() - Method in class suncertify.client.ClientFrame
This method is called to bring up the booking dialog for a reservation when the Book menu item is selected or when a row in the display table is double-clicked on.
BookingData - Class in suncertify.db
Implementation of the BookingDB interface for the URLyBird Application.
BookingData(String) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.BookingData
Constructs a data object that controls access to the data file specified by the filename parameter.
BookingDataProxy - Class in suncertify.db
This class provides a proxy so that classes can access data across the network transparently as if they were using a non-networked data access object that implements the BookingDB interface.
BookingDB - Interface in suncertify.db
An extended version of the DB interface to provide specific functionality required for the URLyBird Application.
BookingDBFactory - Class in suncertify.db
This factory class is used to make instances of classes that implement the BookingDB interface.
BookingDBFactory(Configuration) - Constructor for class suncertify.db.BookingDBFactory
Constructs a new factory object which will create objects that implement the BookingDB interface whose implementation is determined by the specified Configuration.
BookingDialog - Class in suncertify.client
This dialog is used to book a record to a specific person who becomes the owener of the booking.
BookingDialog(JFrame, BookingDB, int) - Constructor for class suncertify.client.BookingDialog
Creates a new instance of BookingDialog.
BookingDialog.OpenRecord - Class in suncertify.client
An inner class that implements Runnable in order to obtain the lock on the record to be opened in a seperate thread, waiting if need be for the record to become available without locking up the GUI thread thereby allowing it to display a waiting message.
bookingTable - Variable in class suncertify.client.ClientFrame
The table for displaying the booking details and search results.
BookingTableModel - Class in suncertify.client
A TableModel implementation to model the data stored in a database accessed with a BookingDB implememtation making it available for display in a JTable.
BookingTableModel(BookingDB) - Constructor for class suncertify.client.BookingTableModel
Creates a new instance of the TableModel using the supplied BookingDB object for data access.
Bootstrap - Class in suncertify
This class contains the main method to load configuration parameters and start the application.

Configuration(String, String[], String) - Constructor for class suncertify.Configuration
